Body:
"""
        Test that a TypeError is raised when an invalid value is used to set
        the new attribute of a ModifyAttribute request payload.
        """
kwargs = {'new_attribute': 'invalid'}
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError,
    'The new attribute must be a NewAttribute object.', payloads.
    ModifyAttributeRequestPayload, **kwargs)
args = payloads.ModifyAttributeRequestPayload(), 'new_attribute', 'invalid'
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError,
    'The new attribute must be a NewAttribute object.', setattr, *args)
